application_credentials.description:
Login to Home Connect requires a client ID and secret. To acquire them, please follow the following steps.

1. Visit the [Home Connect Developer Program website]({developer_dashboard_url}) and sign up for a development account.
1. Enter the email of your login for the original Home Connect app under **Default Home Connect User Account for Testing** in the signup process.
1. Go to the [Applications]({applications_url}) page and select [Register Application]({register_application_url}) and set the fields to the following values:
   * **Application ID**: Home Assistant (or any other name that makes sense)
   * **OAuth Flow**: Authorization Code Grant Flow
   * **Redirect URI**: `{redirect_url}`

In the newly created application's details, you will find the **Client ID** and the **Client Secret**.

abort.missing_configuration: The component is not configured. Please follow the documentation.
abort.no_url_available: No URL available. For information about this error, [check the help section]({docs_url})
abort.oauth_unauthorized: OAuth authorization error while obtaining access token.
abort.wrong_account: Please ensure you reconfigure against the same account.

oauth_discovery.description: Home Assistant has found a Home Connect device on your network. Be aware that the setup of Home Connect is more complicated than many other integrations. Press **Submit** to continue setting up Home Connect.

data_description.implementation: The credentials you want to use to authenticate.

reauth_confirm.description: The Home Connect integration needs to re-authenticate your account
reauth_confirm.title: Authentication expired for {name}

confirm.description:
The alarm clock entity `{entity_id}` is deprecated because it's being moved to the `number` platform.

Please use the new `number` entity.
confirm.title: Deprecated alarm clock entity
Deprecated alarm clock entity detected in some automations or scripts

deprecated_time_alarm_clock_in_automatio.title: Deprecated alarm clock entity detected in some automations or scripts

set_program_and_options.description: Starts or selects a program with options or sets the options for the active or the selected program.

affects_to.description: Selects if the program affected by the action should be the active or the selected program.
affects_to.name: Affects to

b_s_h_common_option_duration.description: Defines the run-time of the program. Afterwards, the appliance is stopped.
b_s_h_common_option_duration.name: Duration

b_s_h_common_option_finish_in_relative.description: Defines when the program should end in seconds.
b_s_h_common_option_finish_in_relative.name: Finish in relative

b_s_h_common_option_start_in_relative.description: Defines in how many time the program should start.
b_s_h_common_option_start_in_relative.name: Start in relative

consumer_products_cleaning_robot_option_.description: Defines which reference map is to be used.
consumer_products_cleaning_robot_option_.name: Reference map ID

consumer_products_coffee_maker_option_be.description: Describes the amount of coffee beans used in a coffee machine program.
consumer_products_coffee_maker_option_be.name: Bean amount

consumer_products_coffee_maker_option_co.description: Describes the coffee temperature used in a coffee machine program.
consumer_products_coffee_maker_option_co.name: Coffee Temperature

consumer_products_coffee_maker_option_fi.description: Describes the amount of water (in ml) used in a coffee machine program.
consumer_products_coffee_maker_option_fi.name: Fill quantity

consumer_products_coffee_maker_option_fl.description: Defines the water-coffee contact time. The duration extends to coffee intensity.
consumer_products_coffee_maker_option_fl.name: Flow rate

consumer_products_coffee_maker_option_ho.description: Defines the temperature suitable for the type of tea.
consumer_products_coffee_maker_option_ho.name: Hot water temperature

consumer_products_coffee_maker_option_mu.description: Defines if double dispensing is enabled.
consumer_products_coffee_maker_option_mu.name: Multiple beverages

cooking_oven_option_fast_pre_heat.description: Defines if the cooking compartment is heated up quickly. Please note that the setpoint temperature has to be equal to or higher than 100 °C or 212 °F. Otherwise, the fast pre-heat option is not activated.
cooking_oven_option_fast_pre_heat.name: Fast pre-heat

cooking_oven_option_setpoint_temperature.description: Defines the target cavity temperature, which will be held by the oven.
cooking_oven_option_setpoint_temperature.name: Setpoint temperature

cooking_oven_option_warming_level.description: Defines the level of the warming drawer.
cooking_oven_option_warming_level.name: Warming level

dishcare_dishwasher_option_brilliance_dr.description: Defines if the program sequence is optimized with a special drying cycle to ensure more shine on glasses and plastic items.
dishcare_dishwasher_option_brilliance_dr.name: Brilliance dry

dishcare_dishwasher_option_eco_dry.description: Defines if the door is opened automatically for extra energy efficient and effective drying.
dishcare_dishwasher_option_eco_dry.name: Eco dry

dishcare_dishwasher_option_extra_dry.description: Defines if improved drying for glasses and plasticware is enabled.
dishcare_dishwasher_option_extra_dry.name: Extra dry

dishcare_dishwasher_option_half_load.description: Defines if economical cleaning is enabled for smaller loads. This reduces energy and water consumption and also saves time. The utensils can be placed in the upper and lower baskets.
dishcare_dishwasher_option_half_load.name: Half load

dishcare_dishwasher_option_hygiene_plus.description: Defines if the cleaning is done with increased temperature. This ensures maximum hygienic cleanliness for regular use.
dishcare_dishwasher_option_hygiene_plus.name: Hygiene +

dishcare_dishwasher_option_intensiv_zone.description: Defines if the cleaning is done with higher spray pressure on the lower basket for very dirty pots and pans.
dishcare_dishwasher_option_intensiv_zone.name: Intensive zone

dishcare_dishwasher_option_silence_on_de.description: Defines if the extra silent mode is activated for a selected period of time.
dishcare_dishwasher_option_silence_on_de.name: Silence on demand

dishcare_dishwasher_option_vario_speed_p.description: Defines if the program run time is reduced by up to 66% with the usual optimum cleaning and drying.
dishcare_dishwasher_option_vario_speed_p.name: Vario speed +

dishcare_dishwasher_option_zeolite_dry.description: Defines if the program sequence is optimized with special drying cycle ensures improved drying for glasses, plates and plasticware.
dishcare_dishwasher_option_zeolite_dry.name: Zeolite dry

laundry_care_dryer_option_drying_target.description: Describes the drying target for a dryer program.
laundry_care_dryer_option_drying_target.name: Drying target

laundry_care_washer_option_i_dos1_active.description: Defines if the detergent feed is activated / deactivated. (i-Dos content 1)
laundry_care_washer_option_i_dos1_active.name: i-Dos 1 Active

laundry_care_washer_option_i_dos2_active.description: Defines if the detergent feed is activated / deactivated. (i-Dos content 2)
laundry_care_washer_option_i_dos2_active.name: i-Dos 2 Active

laundry_care_washer_option_spin_speed.description: Defines the spin speed of a washer program.
laundry_care_washer_option_spin_speed.name: Spin speed

laundry_care_washer_option_temperature.description: Defines the temperature of the washing program.
laundry_care_washer_option_temperature.name: Temperature

laundry_care_washer_option_vario_perfect.description: Defines if a cycle saves energy (Eco Perfect) or time (Speed Perfect).
laundry_care_washer_option_vario_perfect.name: Vario perfect

set_program_and_options.name: Set program and options
